organizations: New York Baseball Giants Nostalgia Society
lead_paragraph: A picture caption in some editions last Monday with an article about the New York Baseball Giants Nostalgia Society misidentified the Giants’ opponent and misstated the score for their final game at the Polo Grounds on Sept. 29, 1957. It was the Pirates — not the Phillies — and the Giants lost the game by 9-1, not 2-1. (The Phillies defeated the Brooklyn Dodgers that day, 2-1.).
